name: Camp Camp Infinite Runner
description:
In this unofficial fan made game based on Rooster Teeth's Camp Camp, it appears David has angered the mascot and is being chased through the forest. Help him dodge obstacles.

This game has no ending, its more of a challenge to see how far you can get. I may go back in and add a High Score list like I did in Lunar Lander game.

The art in this game was taken straight from the show.

Camp Camp Lunar Lander

Behind the Scenes:
I was originally inspired to create this game because of the art style of the show. It leans so much into a 2d game that I just wanted to make something, anything based on it. So I created this and the Lunar Lander Clone. It originally was going to contain an easter egg that required you to run a specific number of feet and I had hidden more information in the Lunar Lander that would contain more info also, but I ran out of time and cancelled that idea.... Maybe next time.
